Module io.github.jokerhasnopersonality
Package io.github.jokerhasnopersonality.snake.model

Class Field

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.jokerhasnopersonality.snake.model.Field
  • public class Field
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing game field that holds player's snake, food points and barrier blocks.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Field​(int fieldWidth, int fieldHeight, int maxFoodCount)
      Field controller constructor.

      • Field

        public Field​(int fieldWidth,
             int fieldHeight,
             int maxFoodCount)
      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Field controller constructor.
        Parameters:
        fieldWidth - width of the game field
        fieldHeight - height of the game field
        maxFoodCount - maximum number of food points that can be on the field at the same time
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        public void initField()
        Clears the field for new game. Adds a snake, specified number of food points and relevant number of barriers to field.
